#Outlier Handling
```{r}
# Calculate IQR boundaries
Q1_w <- quantile(imm_df$DenominatorWeighted, 0.25, na.rm = TRUE)
Q3_w <- quantile(imm_df$DenominatorWeighted, 0.75, na.rm = TRUE)
IQR_w <- Q3_w - Q1_w
lower_w <- Q1_w - 1.5 * IQR_w
upper_w <- Q3_w + 1.5 * IQR_w

Q1_uw <- quantile(imm_df$DenominatorUnweighted, 0.25, na.rm = TRUE)
Q3_uw <- quantile(imm_df$DenominatorUnweighted, 0.75, na.rm = TRUE)
IQR_uw <- Q3_uw - Q1_uw
lower_uw <- Q1_uw - 1.5 * IQR_uw
upper_uw <- Q3_uw + 1.5 * IQR_uw

# Cap values to the IQR limits
imm_df <- imm_df %>%
  mutate(
    DenominatorWeighted = pmin(pmax(DenominatorWeighted, lower_w), upper_w),
    DenominatorUnweighted = pmin(pmax(DenominatorUnweighted, lower_uw), upper_uw)
  )


```
